content: **knitted hat with rib in drops sky ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern skip-064 yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** s/m m/l head circumference approx 54/56 - 56/58 cm = 21 1/4 /22 22 /22 3/4 **materials** drops sky from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50-100 g color 17 curry **knitting gauge ** 23 stitches in width and 32 row vertically in stockinette stitch = 10 x 10 cm = 4 x 4 note rib will contract the piece in width needles drops double pointed needles size 3 mm = us 2 5 drops circular needle size 3 mm = us 2 5 length 40 cm = 16 needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm = 4 switch to larger needles if you have too few stitches on 10 cm = 4 switch to smaller needles
